Dear List,

Having just committed to a master bathroom remodel, a friend just offered me this morning a tanto w/ important koshirae that I have wanted for quite a while. It figures!

I am trying to raise funds a wee bit on the fast side. I've listed my Oei Bizen Morokage (2 sets of Yoshikawa NTHK papers, sashikomi polish supposedly by Kentaro Yoshikawa) with Darcy at:   www.nihonto.ca

Direct link:  http://www.nihonto.ca/morokage/index.html

click through the link and see all the photos. The photos are not the best because I did not send the sword to Darcy for photographs. It is a very beautiful and elegant sword.

****   Price is listed at $8500 but I will cut it to ____$7500_____ and if others want to make me counter offers in the next 2 weeks, I will consider them.  I've turned down offers at $7,500 before- but special circumstances rule for now. ****

Please contact me off list if interested.

Curran
